content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[ext_DIM_INVENTLOCATION] WITH (
        LOCATION = 'DIM_INVENTLOCATION/Archive',
        DATA_SOURCE = [eds_tx-halfen-2-dwh],
        FILE_FORMAT = [eff_Csv] 
) AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK './DIM_INVENTLOCATION/DIM_INVENTLOCATION.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV', parser_version = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR =';',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\r',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH (
       	[DW_Id] bigint,
        [NAME] VARCHAR (140) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        [INVENTLOCATIONID] VARCHAR (10) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        [DATAAREAID] VARCHAR (4) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        [DW_Batch] bigint,
        [DW_SourceCode] VARCHAR (15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        [DW_TimeStamp] DATETIME2
    ) AS [result]
